Virtual whiteboard for sketching hand-drawn like diagrams

overview.overview: Excalidraw is an open source virtual hand-drawn style whiteboard. It can help you to create collaborative and end-to-end encrypted diagrams.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Excalidraw is a powerful online drawing tool that is simple and easy to use with a hand-drawn style. It supports various types of graphics elements, including geometric shapes and custom hand-drawn elements, which can be directly inserted into Obsidian notes and seamlessly integrated with other Obsidian functions. Excalidraw is not only a drawing tool, but also a creative expression method that allows users to easily create and share visual content.
